column1: #text=Today I decided to bake a cake for my daughter 's birthday .
#text=I knew she would want a chocolate cake , so I went to the store to purchase ingredients .
#text=I bought cake mix and frosting , as well as ingredients necessary to make the cake such as eggs and oil .
#text=I came home and made sure that my kitchen was clean and ready to bake in .
#text=I set the oven to preheat and went about mixing up the cake batter .
#text=While the oven was preheating , I greased and floured a cake pan and dumped the batter into it .
#text=Finally , the oven beeped which signaled that it was ready .
#text=I placed the cake on the middle rack in the oven and shut the oven door .
#text=I checked the back of the cake mix box to see timing instructions for the pan size I chose , and set the built-in timer on my oven accordingly .
#text=While the cake was baking , I cleaned up my mess .
#text=I wiped down the counters , put the mixer away , and loaded the dishwasher .
#text=Once the timer went off , I removed the cake from the oven and set it aside to cool .
#text=Once it was cool , I frosted and decorated it .
